resources.string:
***General help*** 
 
'Install Driver' - Install/Update ViPER4Android effect driver. 
'Uninstall Driver' - Uninstall ViPER4Android effect driver. 
'FX Compatible Mode' - Set effect compatibility mode. 
 'Normal' - Make ViPER4Android a global effect. 
 'Compatible' - Make ViPER4Android a local effect. 
 
No V4A effect on all/most mediaplayers?
 You can switch the FX mode to compatible then restart your device and try again. 
 
How to change driver audio quality?
 Uninstall driver in menu then restart your device and choose the quality you want. 
 
How to reduce battery consumption?
 When V4A is running in Normal Mode, switch off system sound settings including touch sounds and lock/unlock sounds to save up to 1.2~4 times battery life. 
 
Forum: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2191223
